country_code.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code indicating the country where the phone number is registered (e.g., "US" for United States, "CA" for Canada).

area_code.description: The area code portion of the phone number. For North American numbers, this is typically a 3-digit code that identifies the geographic region.

phone_number.description: The complete phone number in E.164 format without formatting (e.g., "12127654321"). This is the actual phone number available for purchase from the telecom provider.
